text: Cakkhāyatanaṃ sotāyatanaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ jivhāyatanaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ manāyatanaṃ idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave saḷāyatanaṃ
edit: Cakkhāyatanaṃ sotāyatanaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ jivhāyatanaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ manāyatanaṃ – idaṃ vuccati bhikkhave saḷāyatanaṃ

translations.transtext: Eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, [and] mind -- this, monks, is called six sense bases.
